title: Promote a row to a column - Part 2: Power Query Challenge
excerpt: Today is part 2 of the challenge. I will show you how I clean the website code to get the session information. The trick I used was to promote the rows to columns.  What is this Power Query Challenge? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_R1rSdXkVDw  Source files: https://github.com/ruthpozuelo/PQChallenge
